basics.name: Cody Mazza-Anthony
basics.label: Staff Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Staff Machine Learning Engineer at Shopify. I work on Large Language Models.

work.name: Shopify
highlights: Technical lead for Shopify's AI assistant, Sidekick.
Developed SOTA data generation techniques for fine-tuning LLMs.
Extensive experience with pre-training and post-training (LoRa, DPO, RLHF) of open-source LLMs.

work.name: Squarepoint Capital
highlights: Supervised 3 research engineers in developing an Auto-ML framework which includes exploratory data analysis, model fitting, hyperparameter optimization and model interpretation.
Designed and implemented objective functions for portfolio optimization.
Developed regression model for a long-short equity strategy surpassing previous benchmarks by 4%.
Constructed an algorithm trading framework for volatility products.

work.name: Morgan Stanley
highlights: Developed risk infrastructure and distributed computing grid for fixed income derivative products.
Implemented shock and stress testing for fixed income derivatives.
Delivered optimal Java server reporting engine to the Bank Deposits Team that manages $140 Billion in firmwide deposits.
